titles.title: Sing Praises unto God sing praises

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing praises unto God, sing praises. x3
Hallelujah. (Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For God is the King over all the earth.
Sing praises unto Him with understanding.
O clap your hands and shout all ye people
For He is greatly to be praised.
